title: misc/release: missing description for content in side download package
body:
the package we download, e.g https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.4.2.darwin-amd64-osx10.8.tar.gz

contains several folder and files. some of the are very self describable, e.g "test", "src", "doc"
but some folder are kind of not sure what it does, e.g "include", "lib", "misc", "api"  

will be good in the read me file, add another section to describe what each folder do and why we need them.
